It is the symptoms of Fever,I suggest for healing. Depending on the cause, treatments can include hydration, fever-reducing medications (like acetaminophen or ibuprofen), and treating the underlying condition.
It is the symptoms of Common Cold,I suggest for healing.Symptomatic relief with rest, hydration, and over-the-counter medications.
It is the symptoms of Influenza (Flu),I suggest for healing. Antiviral drugs (e.g., oseltamivir), rest, fluids, and fever reducers.
It is the symptoms of Diarrhea,I suggest for healing. Oral rehydration solutions (ORS), probiotics, and addressing the underlying infection or cause.
It is the symptoms of Headache,I suggest for healing. Adequate hydration, rest, pain relievers (e.g., aspirin, ibuprofen), and treating the cause.
It is the symptoms of Skin Infections,I suggest for healing. Topical or oral antibiotics, antifungal, or antiviral medications, and good hygiene.

patterns: Usually asymptomatic but can lead to headaches

It is the symptoms of Bronchitis,I suggest for healing. Rest, hydration, cough suppressants, and avoiding lung irritants
It is the symptoms of Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD),I suggest for healing.Antacids, proton pump inhibitors (PPIs), dietary changes, and surgery in severe cases
It is the symptoms of Urinary Tract Infection (UTI),I suggest for healing.Antibiotics, hydration, and maintaining hygiene.
It is the symptoms of Arthritis,I suggest for healing. Pain relievers, anti-inflammatory drugs, physiotherapy, and lifestyle modifications.
It is the symptoms of Obesity,I suggest for healing.  Diet, exercise, weight-loss medications, or bariatric surgery.
It is the symptoms of Hepatitis,I suggest for healing.Antiviral drugs, avoiding alcohol, and liver-friendly diets.
It is the symptoms of Tuberculosis (TB),I suggest for healing.Long-term antibiotics (e.g., rifampin, isoniazid).
It is the symptoms of Malaria,I suggest for healing.Antimalarial drugs (e.g., artemisinin, chloroquine), preventive measures like bed nets.
It is the symptoms of Dengue Fever,I suggest for healing.Supportive care (hydration, fever reducers), no specific antiviral
It is the symptoms of Depression,I suggest for healing.Counseling, antidepressants, lifestyle adjustments, and support networks
It is the symptoms of Anxiety Disorders,I suggest for healing.Therapy (CBT), medications (SSRIs), relaxation techniques, and exercise.
It is the symptoms of Skin Allergies (Eczema, Urticaria),I suggest for healing.Antihistamines, corticosteroid creams, moisturizers, and avoiding irritants
It is the symptoms of Hypothyroidism,I suggest for healing.Hormone replacement therapy (levothyroxine).
It is the symptoms of Chickenpox (Varicella),I suggest for healing.Supportive care (calamine lotion, fever reducers) and antiviral medication in severe cases

responses: It is the symptoms of Mumps,I suggest for healing.Symptom relief (pain relievers, cold packs); prevented by vaccination

patterns: swollen lymph nodes on my body
responses: It is the symptoms of Rubella (German Measles),I suggest for healing.Supportive care and vaccination for prevention.

It is the symptoms of Typhoid Fever,I suggest for healing.Antibiotics, hydration, and improved sanitation for prevention.
It is the symptoms of  Polio (Poliomyelitis),I suggest for healing.Supportive care; prevention through vaccination
It is the symptoms of Sinusitis,I suggest for healing.Decongestants, antibiotics (if bacterial), and nasal irrigation
It is the symptoms of  Whooping Cough (Pertussis),I suggest for healing.Antibiotics and vaccination for prevention.

It is the symptoms of Hyperthyroidism,I suggest for healing.Antithyroid medications, radioactive iodine, or surgery.
It is the symptoms of Migraine,I suggest for healing.Pain relievers, migraine-specific drugs, and lifestyle changes.

responses: It is the symptoms of Gallstones,I suggest for healing.Dietary adjustments, medications, or gallbladder removal

patterns: My veins are huge and twisted
responses: It is the symptoms of Varicose Veins,I suggest for healing.Compression stockings, exercise, and surgery if severe.

responses: It is the symptoms of Insomnia,I suggest for healing.Sleep hygiene, relaxation techniques, and cognitive-behavioral therapy.

patterns: Scaly spots on the skin of my body
